channel.title: Very Noob Question
channel.description: i want to make a server but have no idea what im doing i was wondering when you download moparscape and open it then click start server and you can log on your own little server, make yourself admin etc but theres no shops or anything can you make a server like this? if so where do i put the codes i know its a bit noobish lol :confused:

item.title: Very Noob Question
item.dc:creator: @everette everette
item.description:
@everette wrote:

ahh thanks
im a bit of a noob and want to make a server
i know what router and all tht is
but dont understand the instructions moparscape thing give you =]
i have hamachi and moparscape downloaded, anyone help?

Read full topic
